story:
We have implemented one of the feature of QforQuran on the Facebook App. Experience QforQuran Community Reading with us

Click Here: QforQuran Facebook App



We are building a community driven Quran app that builds your daily Quran reading habit through routine tracking, instant gratification and intelligent data analytics.

QforQuran Product Features

QForQuran is world’s first habit building Quran app. This app will allow you to build up your habit step by step, brick by brick. It's a community driven platform – which means now you can read the Quran along with millions of other Muslims.

So come and join us! - 

  • Set your yearly and monthly Quran reading goals and, 
  • Get 5 minute daily reading tasks. 
  • Get daily reminders and recommendations. 
  • Receive motivation and support from the community on daily basis.

We envision building a vibrant online Muslim community – that reads thousands of Qurans every single day. Come, join us for a noble cause !

            


Perks We Offer

As this is a cause for a noble effort and the main takeaways of contribution will be immense Baraka and Rehma that Allah Subhana wt’Allah sall inshAllah bestow upon us.  Beautifully and carefully designed souvenirs would also be provided to the contributors as tokens of good will. These will serve as a pleasant reminder of your participation in this endeavor.

For Direct Contributions
Please Click HERE.


#Q-Shirts are offered in two different colors, with an access to all the features of app, and special mention of our contributor on our website.


#QoffeeMugs are offered in two different colors. The perk also includes fully featured app, and special mentioning on our website.


Habit Building System:

QforQuran is not just another Quran reading app, it is a habit building system geared to develop and improve your relationship  with the Quran. Embedded with our extensive research, QforQuran analyzes your daily routine and suggests the best time for you to read the Quran, so that you are able to achieve your set targets optimally. 

The app also considers your daily, nightly, and weekly routines to provide recommendations tailored to personally help you develop a habit of reading the Quran and to strengthen your relationship with it. 

Quran Reading and Progress Tracking


QforQuran creates a schedule of daily reading tasks based on whichever target you set. For example the user may set a target to complete one full recitation of the Quran in one year. The app will present a timetable  for the whole year with 99 levels or tasks. During the whole year, the app will readjusts daily and adapts dynamically according to your progress. 

The app designs a plan and presents it to you.  Moreover, it will send you reminders so that you can achieve your goal according to your set schedule. The user can always see the reading progress and targets through the app.



Community Involvement

Community involvement is one of the distinguishing features of QforQuran. The app offers an opportunity for you to initiate a new recitation of the Quran or be part of a recitation initiated by someone else. When you start a new recitation, you can invite your friends and family to join you in the reading. The app divides the recitation into 500 small reading tasks and assigns them to the participants of your group. Every time a reader finishes an assigned task they can update their progress with few swipes. As soon as the recitation of the Quran is completed you receive a notification about the reading progress of the group. This way a community is formed instantly around a single noble cause, making it possible to read the entire Quran in as little as 10 minutes. 

So let's connect with each other and with ourselves through QforQuran, 

Why we need the funds?

At this stage QForQuran’s initial design and mock-up screens are ready. But in order to complete the development process, we need the community’s help. We want to ensure that we have a professionally designed system that works successfully and seamlessly with 10 million users from around the world.  We need the funds for the following activities

  • Development
  • User testing
  • Quran text verification
  • Marketing & promotion
  • Payroll
  • Extensive user education
  • Distribution
  • Licensing
  • Consultants
  • Multiple language support

With community’s support, if we are able to meet our funding goals, inshAllah we will be in a position to fully design and launch our app before Ramadan 2016.

Risks and Challenges

  • We are staunch believers in lean and agile development of our business and technology, we believe that all the challenges can be overcome through iterative ideation, prototyping and externsive user testing.
  • We see that as we progress we would require a large group of users to develop and test the community feature of QforQuran further. The key here is diversity. We believe that the more diverse our test-user group is, the more compatible QForQuran will be for a global audience.
  • Last but not the least we aspire to serve the Arabic speakers and non-Arabic speakers alike. This would require additional features like language support,  Arabic pronunciation guides.
  • We urge our users to join and help us further improve our business model and app features and to help us face the challenges by sharing their time, knowledge and ideas.

Quote from Quran

“O mankind, there has come to you instruction from your Lord [ The Qur’an] and healing for what is in the chests and guidance and mercy for the believers. Say, “It is the bounty of Allah and His mercy – [that He sent this Qur’an] so let them rejoice over it for it’s better than the worldly riches they’re collecting.”  

[Qur’an: Chapter 10, Verse 57-58]

Meet the Team

We have assembled a dream team for our journey. Since our target audience is spread globally, we decided that our team should reflect that diversity as well.  Browse through our team, get in touch with us - we would love to tell you more about our project.

Our Team Philosophy:

 

 "I am the servant of the Qur'an as long as I have life. I am the dust on the path of Muhammad, the Chosen One”  

Mavlana Rumi            


Core Team - The Dreamers



Habib Ahmed is a Finnish entrepreneur. He has been the Manager Operations in a leading Finnish company that provides smart energy solution for 3 years. He challenged himself to find a simpler way of reading the Quran; thus ‘QforQuran’ came into being. His vision is to unite Muslims by giving them a common goal.



Atif Abdul Majeed is based in Australia. He specializes in start up marketing and product development. He joined QForQuran because he believes that this app has all the much needed and innovative features to connect with Quran.




Santtu Puhakka is a Media Manager based in Finland. He is the co-founder of Prambag,  and has experience in user centered product development. He joined the QforQuran team because he believes in positive moral values and their impact in society.



Saqib Saghir is an experienced web developer, looking to build a spiritual connection in Finland. He has been working for QforQuran since its inception. He believes that QforQuran app will open new ways to connect with the holy book Quran.

Social Media Team – The Digital Geniuses



Partners – Our Extended Family

FBStart - Facebook Startup Program
FbStart is a program from Facebook that helps mobile startups succeed. Together with some great partners, they offered a package of free tools and services designed to help us build and grow our mobile app. 

Future Learning Finland – FLF
FLF is a national education export programme, offering Finnish educational know-how and learning solutions globally. This programme is lead and coordinated by FinPro. We are a FLF member organization.

Aalto Design Factory – ADF
Today ADF is one of the spearhead projects and one of the first physical manifestations of Aalto University encouraging and enabling fruitful interaction between students, researchers, and professional practitioners. Currently, our company is situated in their Partner Plaza Space. 

Finnish Islamic Council's Imam
The Imam of the board, Mr. Anas Hajjar is our adviser in religious affairs. Finnish Islamic Council intended to serve as a cooperative body and discussion forum for Islamic communities in Finland. 

Solinor: The development partners
As a pioneer of new era Digital Services, Solinor is driven by a mission to create world class digital services for its customers. Their services for QforQuran covers the whole software development lifecycle, all the way from the idea generation to the Operating of the services.

NewCo Helsinki
NewCo Helsinki's Growth Support assists Helsinki-based startups with high growth potential by co-funding the purchase of expert services directly related to the acceleration of the international growth of the company. We are enrolled in their Growth Support Program since February, 2016.

Qotuf
Qotuf is our global partner and was founded by Saudi entrepreneurs in order to build sustainable entrepreneurship. Qotuf fosters greater opportunity for individual entrepreneurs, due to its vast network of local and global partnerships. 


 

For further queries, please email at habib@qforquran.com

story:
Summary

If you are a wine lover then WineFuse.com will be your Online destination for anything about wine. Whether you want to share your latest wine experience with your followers, or be informed by wine lovers whom you follow, or learn about wines, or find out about wine events, or want to shop for wine or wine-related items, then WineFuse.com will be for you. It is the one site where the theme is all about wine, and nothing but wine or wine paraphernalia.

The name says it all. It means to fuse, blend, or bring together a community of wine lovers. Just like different grape varietals are blended or fused together to produce very interesting wines, so does WineFuse.com fuse together similar and different wine lovers into a common theme, namely wine. Rather than "wine experts" telling people what they should drink or like, the WineFuse community is designed for wine lovers to provide insights and feedback to their fellow wine lovers. That does not mean that "wine experts" will be excluded from the community. They will be allowed to participate just like any other member. It is up to members to decide who to follow.

About Us

We are a husband and wife team, Jay & Monica Sadie, who represent superb quality wines produced by family-run wine farms. After living in the winelands of South Africa for 6 years, we decided to import South African wines into the USA, and to promote these wines through events and education. It is our pleasure to represent wine farm communities that we have hand-selected for both quality and their passion for making farm to table wines. We are educated and certified in viticulture and wine making through the Cape Wine Academy.

This campaign is important to us due to our love and passion for wine. Wine is not just wine. It is a lifestyle, a conversation starter, a food-enhancer, it brings people together, and it's a way of life to many communities across the globe. People who like wine are for the most part nice people, with an appreciation for the finer things in life. We meet a lot of people in our business and we have found that wine lovers are a pleasure to socialize with.

We came up with the idea to create an Online community for wine lovers for many reasons. The idea did not come overnight, but rather developed over a period of about a year. There are many places to go to on the Internet to read about or locate wines, or to socialize with other wine lovers. But there is no one site dedicated to wine lovers as a community. WineFuse.com will be this site.

By contributing to this campaign you will make it possible for us to build it. We have already spent some of our own funds to get to this point, however, we need your help to take it to the next level. It will take some time before the site will generate sufficient income to be self-sustaining. Your funds will get us through this initial non-profitable period.

What We Need

  • We need to raise a minimum of $10,000 to build WineFuse.com. Raising more than this amount will allow us to get the site up & running faster, due to the fact that we'll be able to employ the services of additional resources.
  • All the funds we collect from this campaign will go towards website development, mobile app development, and to pay for the hosting, administration and management of the site.
  • Even if we don't reach our entire goal, any funds received will help make WineFuse.com possible, just at a slower pace.

What You Get

Our unique perks are designed to inspire you to become part of the WineFuse.com community by being more than just a member:

  • You will be invited to be a beta tester and experience our site before the official launch. You will have the unique opportunity to provide feedback and suggestions, thereby having the satisfaction you played an important role in helping us build the site.
  • You will be listed on our contributors page (unless you choose to opt out). The contributor list will be sorted by amount, high to low. Viewers can also sort by date of contribution, or by Name. Sort high to low, or low to high. Search criteria can also be entered on any column. If a contributor is also a member on the site then a link will be displayed to view the contributor's profile.
  • The following contributions will receive instant rebate coupons for wines imported by Sovereign Selection and sold by participating Online retailers:
    • $10 -- $20 instant rebate for a $200 minimum order
    • $20 -- $40 instant rebate for a $275 minimum order
    • $50 -- $100 instant rebate for a $500 minimum order
    • $100 -- Two $100 instant rebate coupons for a $500 minimum order per coupon. 2 months of free Concierge Level membership, a $50 value. Total value of this perk = $250.
    • $500 -- Twelve $100 instant rebate coupons for a $500 minimum order per coupon. 12 months of free Concierge Level membership, a $300 value. Total value of this perk = $1,500.
      Note: Above rebate coupons subject to local laws. 21+ only.

The Impact

The advent of the Internet and social media has forever changed our lives in the way we interact and find information about things we need or feel passionate about. The biggest challenge we all face is information overload. There is so much information out there it is sometimes difficult to see the forest from the trees.

WineFuse.com serves a very precise purpose. It is a social media community for wine lovers, where everything revolves around one single theme... wine. Every piece of information found on this site will either be about wine, or something to do about or in support of wine. There will be no other distractions or non-related subject matter. Only wine!

Here are some examples of what you will be able to do or find on WineFuse.com:

  • View posts of wine lovers you follow (your news feed).
  • Post anything you want to share about wine to your grapevine. This is just our term for what Facebook calls a wall or timeline.
  • Learn about wines. Access informational and how-to videos, articles and educational materials to broaden your knowledge about wine.
  • Locate wine tasting events or wine-related events/tours such as seminars, social gatherings, food parings, wine tours, cruises, etc.
  • Comprehensive wine database - Wine producers or importers may post information about wines on the Shopping section of WineFuse.com. Retailers may link to these wines to indicate that it can be bought from them. If they have an Online Sales page then a link can be created to allow members to purchase relevant wines. If a member sees a wine he/she may be interested in the member can ask to see a list of all retailers that carry that wine. The member can limit the list based on State, City, Zip Code or Maximum Distance from a specified location. Another option is to look only at retailers who provide Online Sales.
  • Once a member has purchased a wine, the member may write a short review and may rate the wine based on the following 100-Point Scale:
    • 95-100 -- Classic; a great wine
    • 90-94 -- Outstanding; superior character and style
    • 80-89 -- Good to very good; wine with special qualities
    • 70-79 -- Average; drinkable wine that may have minor flaws
    • 60-69 -- Below average; drinkable but not recommended
    • 50-59 -- Poor; undrinkable, not recommended

For a more detailed explanation and sneak preview of what WineFuse will look like please check out our work in progress by clicking on this link.

Risks & Challenges

Murphy's law states that if something can go wrong it will go wrong. No project will ever run flawlessly. There will always be hurdles and challenges to overcome. We are no strangers to facing huge obstacles and setbacks. Starting a wine import business was one of our challenges. It literally took almost two years to set up the business. The amount of paperwork, licenses, regulations, sourcing of wines, finding a location, etc. all amounted to a huge challenge. But we prevailed and successfully pulled it off. We even built our own website, SovereignSelection.com.

Monica was in the real estate business for 14 years prior to becoming a wine specialist, and Jay spent more than 20 years in the computer software industry, focusing on business intelligence, application and website building. Together we have the know-how and experience to make a success of this project. The missing piece of the puzzle is funding!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute financially, there are other ways you can help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Join our community - http://WineFuse.com/
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for spending your valuable time considering our campaign.
story_txt:
Summary
If you are a wine lover then WineFuse.com will be your Online destination for anything about wine. Whether you want to share your latest wine experience with your followers, or be informed by wine lovers whom you follow, or learn about wines, or find out about wine events, or want to shop for wine or wine-related items, then WineFuse.com will be for you. It is the one site where the theme is all about wine, and nothing but wine or wine paraphernalia.
The name says it all. It means to fuse, blend, or bring together a community of wine lovers. Just like different grape varietals are blended or fused together to produce very interesting wines, so does WineFuse.com fuse together similar and different wine lovers into a common theme, namely wine. Rather than "wine experts" telling people what they should drink or like, the WineFuse community is designed for wine lovers to provide insights and feedback to their fellow wine lovers. That does not mean that "wine experts" will be excluded from the community. They will be allowed to participate just like any other member. It is up to members to decide who to follow.


About Us
We are a husband and wife team, Jay & Monica Sadie, who represent superb quality wines produced by family-run wine farms. After living in the winelands of South Africa for 6 years, we decided to import South African wines into the USA, and to promote these wines through events and education. It is our pleasure to represent wine farm communities that we have hand-selected for both quality and their passion for making farm to table wines. We are educated and certified in viticulture and wine making through the Cape Wine Academy.
This campaign is important to us due to our love and passion for wine. Wine is not just wine. It is a lifestyle, a conversation starter, a food-enhancer, it brings people together, and it's a way of life to many communities across the globe. People who like wine are for the most part nice people, with an appreciation for the finer things in life. We meet a lot of people in our business and we have found that wine lovers are a pleasure to socialize with.
We came up with the idea to create an Online community for wine lovers for many reasons. The idea did not come overnight, but rather developed over a period of about a year. There are many places to go to on the Internet to read about or locate wines, or to socialize with other wine lovers. But there is no one site dedicated to wine lovers as a community. WineFuse.com will be this site.
By contributing to this campaign you will make it possible for us to build it. We have already spent some of our own funds to get to this point, however, we need your help to take it to the next level. It will take some time before the site will generate sufficient income to be self-sustaining. Your funds will get us through this initial non-profitable period.


What We Need

We need to raise a minimum of $10,000 to build WineFuse.com. Raising more than this amount will allow us to get the site up & running faster, due to the fact that we'll be able to employ the services of additional resources.
All the funds we collect from this campaign will go towards website development, mobile app development, and to pay for the hosting, administration and management of the site.
Even if we don't reach our entire goal, any funds received will help make WineFuse.com possible, just at a slower pace.




What You Get
Our unique perks are designed to inspire you to become part of the WineFuse.com community by being more than just a member:

You will be invited to be a beta tester and experience our site before the official launch. You will have the unique opportunity to provide feedback and suggestions, thereby having the satisfaction you played an important role in helping us build the site.
You will be listed on our contributors page (unless you choose to opt out). The contributor list will be sorted by amount, high to low. Viewers can also sort by date of contribution, or by Name. Sort high to low, or low to high. Search criteria can also be entered on any column. If a contributor is also a member on the site then a link will be displayed to view the contributor's profile.

The following contributions will receive instant rebate coupons for wines imported by Sovereign Selection and sold by participating Online retailers:


$10 -- $20  instant rebate for a $200 minimum order

$20 -- $40  instant rebate for a $275 minimum order

$50 -- $100  instant rebate for a $500 minimum order

$100 -- Two $100 instant rebate coupons for a $500 minimum order per coupon. 2 months of free Concierge Level membership, a $50 value. Total value of this perk = $250.


$500 -- Twelve $100 instant rebate coupons for a $500 minimum order per coupon. 12 months of free Concierge Level membership, a $300 value. Total value of this perk = $1,500.Note: Above rebate coupons subject to local laws. 21+ only.






The Impact
The advent of the Internet and social media has forever changed our lives in the way we interact and find information about things we need or feel passionate about. The biggest challenge we all face is information overload. There is so much information out there it is sometimes difficult to see the forest from the trees.
WineFuse.com serves a very precise purpose. It is a social media community for wine lovers, where everything revolves around one single theme... wine. Every piece of information found on this site will either be about wine, or something to do about or in support of wine. There will be no other distractions or non-related subject matter. Only wine!
Here are some examples of what you will be able to do or find on WineFuse.com:

View posts of wine lovers you follow (your news feed).
Post anything you want to share about wine to your grapevine. This is just our term for what Facebook calls a wall or timeline.
Learn about wines. Access informational and how-to videos, articles and educational materials to broaden your knowledge about wine.
Locate wine tasting events or wine-related events/tours such as seminars, social gatherings, food parings, wine tours, cruises, etc.
Comprehensive wine database - Wine producers or importers may post information about wines on the Shopping section of WineFuse.com. Retailers may link to these wines to indicate that it can be bought from them. If they have an Online Sales page then a link can be created to allow members to purchase relevant wines. If a member sees a wine he/she may be interested in the member can ask to see a list of all retailers that carry that wine. The member can limit the list based on State, City, Zip Code or Maximum Distance from a specified location. Another option is to look only at retailers who provide Online Sales.
Once a member has purchased a wine, the member may write a short review and may rate the wine based on the following 100-Point Scale:


95-100 -- Classic; a great wine

90-94 -- Outstanding; superior character and style

80-89 -- Good to very good; wine with special qualities

70-79 -- Average; drinkable wine that may have minor flaws

60-69 -- Below average; drinkable but not recommended

50-59 -- Poor; undrinkable, not recommended



For a more detailed explanation and sneak preview of what WineFuse will look like please check out our work in progress by clicking on this link.




Risks & Challenges
 Murphy's law states that if something can go wrong it will go wrong. No project will ever run flawlessly. There will always be hurdles and challenges to overcome. We are no strangers to facing huge obstacles and setbacks. Starting a wine import business was one of our challenges. It literally took almost two years to set up the business. The amount of paperwork, licenses, regulations, sourcing of wines, finding a location, etc. all amounted to a huge challenge. But we prevailed and successfully pulled it off. We even built our own website, SovereignSelection.com.
Monica was in the real estate business for 14 years prior to becoming a wine specialist, and Jay spent more than 20 years in the computer software industry, focusing on business intelligence, application and website building. Together we have the know-how and experience to make a success of this project. The missing piece of the puzzle is funding!


Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can't contribute financially, there are other ways you can help:

Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
Join our community - http://WineFuse.com/

Use the Indiegogo share tools!


Thank you for spending your valuable time considering our campaign.

story:
Let's create job together!

Nowadays the unemployment is a big problem in our life. The other problem is that the people are can not do the work what they realy like.

Help me to create a workplace where everyone would like to work.

I would like to rent trucks with jobs and operate them from your support.
At first I would like to order 2 trucks with job and after that I want to rent a plus 1 about every 4th months in order to I could give job for more people.
The most important for me to give job as many people as I can.
At first I can give job for 4 person but after that I would like to increase this number but I need your help for this!
Please help for me if you can.

CREATE GOOD JOB TOGETHER  -   Please help me to help others


 Thank you!

I would like to establish an Iternational trasport company.

At first, it sounds disinterested but let me speak about myself.

My name is Ferenc, I live in Hungary, Budapest. I'm 28 years old.
My father is a truck driver and in my childhood I often accompanied him to the work.Due to this it was my dream for me to be a truck driver. I reached this childhood dream but then a turning point came to my life. Inspite of my youth, doctors were diagnostic chron's disease in 2009.(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crohn%27s_disease)
Due to this disease I had to stop working as a truck driver. It was a black day in my life. 

However, I want to remain close to the trucks because this is my life.
So then I decided to establish an International Transport company.
It's very important to me to help others.
I would like to give a well-paid job and pay attention to give as many free time for the driver as I can.
The environment is also very important to me so the trucks what I would like to rent are up-to-date.
The vehicles are contains all the safety equipment for the safety driving.
At first I would like to rent two trucks with jobs so the income is guarenteed.

PLEASE HELP ME IF YOU CAN.

                  
                

We would like to use Eco friendly trucks.

This type of truck is very safe and comfortable for the drivers.

The environment is important to us.


We would like to help families whose life is difficult.

Nowadays truck drivers are getting low salary in Hungary and they have to spend too much time abroad without their families, but we want to change it.

Drivers could be well-paid and we try to give them as many time to spend with their families as we can.

TWITTER        -          www.twitter.com/PF_Cargo

FACEBOOK    -          www.facebook.com/PFcargo

EMAIL             -           pf.cargo.2016@gmail.com

story:
Short Summary

We are a small vape juice company based in Kalamazoo, Michigan looking to have our product on store shelves by April 2016. We have spent the last three months developing a line of  juices that offers top quality flavors without the use of diacatyl, acetoin, or butyric acid. This means our line offers the smoothest vaping experience possible without sacrificing flavor.

Blue Batter is like something straight out of any Michigan grandma's kitchen. This blueberry crumble inspired gem layers a strong blueberry filling with a graham cracker crust, all smothered in a heaping pile of sweet cream.

Italian Dessert = Tiramisu. Need I say anything else?

Fat Michael is a blast from the past, a straightforward, minimalist flavor. It stays true to its namesake, the late Gros Michel, by balancing a bold and sweet banana with a background of tart quince.

What We Need & What You Get

Now that we have perfected our formula we need $2400 to get our product on store shelves. This includes the cost of a custom label, promotional materials, and sample pack shipping.

  • We made it easy on the lungs, help us make it easy on the eyes.
  • We wish we could send you a bottle but that's against the rules. Contributions of $100 and up will receive a handwritten letter from our president. They're all individualized so we can't give more detail than that.
  • Should we not reach our goal, we will use the funds for initial label tooling (~$400) and if we raise a bit more, a smaller print run for a local release.

Risks & Challenges

This has required lots of research, determination and personal sacrifice. Our goal was to launch at the end of February but now we're facing an uphill battle with our personal bank accounts drained just before roll out. We are committed to seeing this project take off and to overcome any obstacles ahead. We are determined to get our product out there by late April and share the goodness with you!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you find that you can't contribute financially, you can still help! Please consider spreading word of our campaign with your friends and family, using the share tools here on Indiegogo, and sharing on Facebook and Twitter.

story:
Love Cape Town, Care For People

By the inhalation of toxic fumes of cookstoves, 4.3 million many young children and mothers die each year, reports WHO (World Health Organization). This is more deaths then caused by AIDS, malaria and TB all together! 


Prevent Township fires

Fires caused by unsafe cookstoves tipping over, cause disasters in townships, because liquid paraffin spread fire in seconds.

The solution: Clean Cookstoves

It's easy to caused a safer, healthier and cleaner cooking environment, that is also a lot cheaper for the township inhabitants. Clean Cookstoves that are already in other parts of Africa, can achieve this. The ACE1 stove for example, produced in Lesotho, provides:

 
Join the Master Chefs that support us!
We are delighted and extremely grateful with the support of the best chefs around, from South Africa and other gastronomical areas on the globe!

Moshik, 2 Michelin star Chef &Samhoud Places, the Netherlands

Michael Deg, Chef Delaire Graff, South Africa

 Scot Kirton, La Colombe, South Africa


Empower entrepreneurship, save local costs

Our Clean Cooking Angels are locally recruited mothers, for who selling the cookstoves is a way to create an income stream and to step up. They also are able to empower their environment, because they can recruit new Clean Cooking Angels too.

Our Clean Cooking Ecosystem with our widely branched Clean Cooking Hubs, helps to have the stoves and the fuel to be available closeby.


We have something special for you. 

As a thank you reward, we have collected some unique recipes, lunches, dinners, discounts and other perks, from passionate Master Chefs and restaurants the world over, who support our mission for clean cooking. 




Your contribution saves lives!

Thank you that you are willing to contribute! And thank you for sharing this with your fellow humans, so that even more people can join in.

story:
Thank you all for your generous contribution with Helping Hands to earthquake victims of Nepal. Supplies were distributed locally on May 31, 2015. Your continuing support is critical to success. Find our new campaign at http://igg.me/at/helpinghandsexpeditions 
Friends; Forgetting someone you once loved, is like trying to remember someone you never knew.
It cost $ 10000 USD to build a home. Hari lost his village. Read his story below from the April 25th earthquake. 

Another earthquake severly damaged Nepal at 1PM May 12, 2015,

"Helping Hands for Earthquake victims in Nepal

A Strong 7.9 rector scale Earthquake hit Nepal on Saturday April 25. It has desperately destroyed the ancient historical monuments of Nepal, many houses in Kathmandu and outside of Kathmandu valley. The earthquake was followed by many powerful aftershocks and a new earthquake (6.7) hit Nepal on Sunday April 26. Many (historic) buildings collapsed, temples have been ruined, roads destroyed. More than 7600 deaths in Nepal more than 14400 people are injured and may are still missing. Most of the villagers are homeless.

One of those affected village is Naubise- 3 Dhading Kholegaun Village. We are 18 Kilometer from Kathmandu-Kanalki where inhabitants of about 100 to 110 people and 15 households. Sometime to our village many people called Shadow of Light. Being very near from Kathmandu Valley we don’t have good road, no good toilet, no good tap for water and no strong house. Being Tamang Community most of them are uneducated.

Government Package

Now it has already 12 days of big earthquake. We didn’t get any relief package from our government I have heard that some package has been arrived in VDC office because of political fight they are unable to give to us. We have received some Biscuits, Wai Wai, Tent and Beaten rice from Different Social organization. We are now waiting our government relief pack. We are now waiting our government relief package.

What we have heard

We have heard from different Media and newspaper many foreigners have made billion of USD Dollor Donation to our government to help earthquake victim. If they use it properly every Nepalese people will get 1 million Nepali Rupee to build new house. I am looking the entire news channel after that earthquake many people are carrying big rice sacks with so many foods but we are getting not getting anything at all.

NGO & INGO

I have heard that many NGO and INGO in Nepal brings fund from foreigner two build two toilet and two water tap for every house in Village. But In my village we have no Toilet and we have pipe water but not good tape. I will post photo soon we have paid 7000 Nrs for this project as well.

My Mission

First Phase

After receiving fund from my customers and friends I will buy tent, mat, rice, blanket for my villagers I will go my village and distribute myself with taking all photo graph so that donor will be assured their fund has gone for right peoples.

Second Phase

When I will manage food and shelter for my villagers I will start to build house for my village now my target will be 15 houses in my village which all are damage and can’t be stay. If we are able to raise fund from customer I will make house for them and take photo and send you back. I have many customers who are frequently visiting in Nepal for business proposes I can take him to this house which he has donated. So that he will be sure his money has spend for right people and right propose.

How to success this project? 

Now I am working hard to make all my customer happy because if I have 1000 customer If I request to all denote 10 USD I will have 10000 USD that mean we can make one beautiful house in my village. Mean If I request Monthly 10 USD from my all customer we can make 12 houses in one year. All the credit will go customer from Clothing in Nepal and will visit our village while you will be in Nepal.

To support the village, we have started up our fundraising campaign. We would like to humbly request you all fellow Rotarians, non Rotarians and well-wishers to support us individually in our fundraising campaign. 

Your generous supports are highly appreciated.

Your small contribution makes a difference!

Best Regards

Hari Tamang, Managing Director

Surya Lama, Public Relation Manager

Anita Tamang, Executive Director

Clothing in Nepal Co. Ltd., Kathmandu, Nepal"

Anita Tamang, Executive Director
Clothing in Nepal Co. Ltd., Kathmandu, Nepal"

story:
11:56 NST, 25th April 2015- (Saturday) a 7.8 magnitude earthquake struck Nepal near the capital of Kathmandu (Barpak village of Gorkha district), causing massive devastation in the nation's capital and other districts of Nepal. The earthquake killed at least 7,167 (till 2nd May 2015) and injured more than twice as many people. Rescue efforts are underway and the estimated death toll continues to rise. Homes, buildings, and infrastructure have been badly damaged and destroyed. Some villages have been completely destroyed and people are in desperate need of basic survival items. My village of Jyamdi in Kavrepalanchowk is one of the worst hit areas by the earthquake.

I would like to introduce myself as Sangita Parajuli, born and brought up in the beautiful village Jyamdi of Kavre district in Nepal.  I have a lot of attachment with my home town just like every single one of us and I am trying to do as much as I can to help rebuild the village.

We are in desperate need, we will manage food. That is fine but rebuilding the houses without any external support is simply out of reach. My school ( Shree Bagdevi School) has collapsed as well. Even though the village is not far away from the capital city, nothing has reached the village in terms of aid or help. We are by ourselves and I have been travelling Kathmandu to Jyamdi everyday in search of tents, food and anything else I can collect for the villagers and my family.

WHY ?

I have nothing to say to this, just help put a block in our houses and all we can return is our prayers and wishes.

HOW?

My father has been a primary level teacher ( Shree Bagdevi School, Badri Prasad Parajuli) and member of village community. Everyone in the village knows him and we are working with other members of the village as well to do whatever we can.We have been digging the remains of the houses to find useful stuff and valuable stuff. We have managed to bury all the animals properly by now. We had to dig deep to find the dead bodies, when it comes to human labor, we have the strength and desperation leaves us no choice but to work even harder. 

However, re-building houses require materials and we are in no state of having or buying any.

Please do help if you can !

Anything, Everything is a big help !!

I can be reached at:

Sangita Parajuli

00977 9851149213

The earthquake killed at least 7,167 (till 2nd May 2015) and injured more than twice as many people. Rescue efforts are underway and the estimated death toll continues to rise. Homes, buildings, and infrastructure have been badly damaged and destroyed. Some villages have been completely destroyed and people are in desperate need of basic survival items. My village of Jyamdi in Kavrepalanchowk is one of the worst hit areas by the earthquake.I would like to introduce myself as Sangita Parajuli, born and brought up in the beautiful village Jyamdi of Kavre district in Nepal.  I have a lot of attachment with my home town just like every single one of us and I am trying to do as much as I can to help rebuild the village.We are in desperate need, we will manage food. That is fine but rebuilding the houses without any external support is simply out of reach. My school ( Shree Bagdevi School) has collapsed as well. Even though the village is not far away from the capital city, nothing has reached the village in terms of aid or help. We are by ourselves and I have been travelling Kathmandu to Jyamdi everyday in search of tents, food and anything else I can collect for the villagers and my family.WHY ?I have nothing to say to this, just help put a block in our houses and all we can return is our prayers and wishes.HOW?My father has been a primary level teacher ( Shree Bagdevi School, Badri Prasad Parajuli) and member of village community. Everyone in the village knows him and we are working with other members of the village as well to do whatever we can.We have been digging the remains of the houses to find useful stuff and valuable stuff. We have managed to bury all the animals properly by now. We had to dig deep to find the dead bodies, when it comes to human labor, we have the strength and desperation leaves us no choice but to work even harder. However, re-building houses require materials and we are in no state of having or buying any.Please do help if you can !Anything, Everything is a big help !!I can be reached at:Sangita Parajuli00977 9851149213

story:
ENGLISH VERSION AT THE BOTTOM OF THE PAGE

NUESTRA META

Siempre hemos creído que nadie sabe lo que puede conseguir hasta que lo intenta.

Estamos convencidos de que  la juventud es el momento para soñar, para tener grandes metas, para luchar y esforzarse para lograrlas.

Desde que empezamos a navegar juntos hemos soñado con el objetivo que es ganar el Mundial Juvenil ISAF y este camino que hemos emprendido juntos nos ha acercado un paso más a esa meta.

En los últimos 2 años hemos logrado ser campeones nacionales varonil en el circuito mexicano de vela 2013 y 2014. En los últimos meses hemos ganado la Wesmex, y quedar en 2do lugar en la Copa coporito y la Copa Aaron saenz. Pero nuestro mayor logro ha sido calificar al Mundial Juvenil ISAF 2015 y  tener la  increíble oportunidad de representar a  México. 
El Mundial Juvenil ISAF es la competencia que reúne al mejor equipo  femenino y masculino por país  de  las categorías: Laser, RS:X, I 420, SL16 y 29er de todo el mundo.

Muchos de los ganadores del Mundial ISAF Juvenil se convierten en campeones Olímpicos.    

Visita este link: ISAF Youth Worlds


OBJETIVO

Nuestro objetivo es hacer una buena regata y lograr ganar en el Mundial Juvenil ISAF 2015.

Al lograrlo nos colocaremos en una posición que nos permitirá recibir el apoyo de la Federación Mexicana de Vela y de la CONADE, para así poder entrenar más duro y acercarnos más a nuestro sueño.

Estamos haciendo esta campaña porque necesitamos obtener en los próximos 200 días la mejor preparación posible, entrenando en el extranjero antes del Mundial Juvenil ISAF 2015. 

Con su generoso apoyo podremos lograrlo!

                                              GAHU SAILING TEAM


  



¿Quienes somos?

Dos grandes amigos con una pasión por la vela y un solo sueño. 

Hemos logrado resultados importantes  a lo largo de estos años en la vela.

Hemos  entrenado y competido representando a Guerrero en el circuito nacional: Quintana Roo, Jalisco, Nayarit, Valle de bravo, Veracruz y Representado a Mexico en Portugal (ISAF Juvenil 2014).

LO QUE NECESITAMOS:

En México no contámos con una flota de I 420,   veleamos el  C 420, tampoco tenemos coach de la clase, por eso hemos diseñado un programa de entrenamiento para los meses de Julio y agosto en el extranjero, para así lograr un mejor resultado en el ISAF Juvenil. 

Necesitamos; rentar un barco,  velas, pagar el costo de entrenamiento a los coaches, hospedaje, alimentos y transporte.

    


CUANDO NOS APOYAS TU TAMBIEN RECIBES

Al apoyarnos con una contribución, nosotros te queremos agradecer de una manera personal y especial, ya sea, recibiendo un correo de agradecimiento, una postal desde Malasia,  la oportunidad de velear con nosotros en el C420 y sentir la emoción de navegar en el oceano, o pasar una tarde veleando en el incríeble barco J24 en Acapulco.


Para las contribuciones corporativas, les ofrecemos colocar su logo en nuestro casco y velas para usarlo en las regatas en Acapulco y el Circuito Nacional Mexicano 2015/ 2016.

¡También nos puedes ayudar a correr la voz sobre nuestra campaña, compartiendo este link !

Entre más personas sepan de nuestro objetivo es más probable que la campaña pueda alcanzar su meta.

Dile a tus amigos y familiares por Facebook y por Twitter y síguenos en 

Facebook: https://m.facebook.com/GahuRC

Facebook de Hugo: https://m.facebook.com/hugo.mirandareyes

Facebook de Gabriel: https://m.facebook.com/gabo.gabriel.98

Tambien puede ponerse en contacto con nosotros: 52-744-117-3358 y 
52-744-174-8257

CADA CONTRIBUCIÓN CUENTA, NO IMPORTA EL MONTO, Y LES ESTAMOS MUY AGRADECIDOS

¡Gracias por tomarse el tiempo de leer nuestra campaña y apoyarnos de la manera en que tu puedas!

           



                         ¡GRACIAS!


OUR GOAL

We have always believed that no one knows what you can get until you try.

We are convinced that youth is the time to dream, to have big goals, to struggle and strive to achieve them.

Since we started sailing together we have dreamed of the goal of winning the ISAF World Youth and the path we have undertaken together we have brought us one step closer to that goal.


In the last two years we have become national champions in the men's circuit Mexican candle 2013 and 2014. In recent months we have won the Wesmex, and remain in 2nd place in the Cup and the Copa coporito Aaron Saenz. But our greatest achievement has been to qualify for the 2015 ISAF Youth World and have the amazing opportunity to represent Mexico.

ISAF World Youth is competition that brings together the best female and male team per country categories: Laser, RS: X, R 420, SL16 and 29er worldwide.

Many of the winners of the ISAF World Youth become Olympic champions.

Visit this link: ISAF Youth Worlds


GOAL

Our goal is to make a good race and achieve win in the 2015 ISAF World Youth.

By doing so we will stand in a position that will allow us to receive the support of the Mexican Sailing Federation and the CONADE, so you can train harder and closer to our dream.

We are doing this campaign because we need to get in the next 200 days, the best possible preparation, training abroad before the 2015 ISAF World Youth.

With your generous support we can do it!

                                              GAHU SAILING TEAM

 

Who we are?

Two great friends with a passion for sailing and one dream.

We have trained and competed representing Guerrero in the national circuit, Quintana Roo, Jalisco, Nayarit, Valle de Bravo, Veracruz and Mexico Represented in Portugal (ISAF Youth 2014).

WHAT NEED:

In Mexico we do not have a fleet of I 420, veleamos C 420, do we have coach class, so we have designed a training program for the months of July and August abroad in order to achieve a better result in the ISAF Youth.

We need; rent a boat, sails, pay the cost of training for coaches, lodging, food and transportation.

      


WHEN WE ALSO RECEIVE cheering on your

To support us with a contribution, we will want to thank a personal and special way, either, receiving an email of thanks, a postcard from Malaysia, the opportunity to sail with us on the C420 and feel the thrill of sailing on the ocean, or spend an afternoon in the incríeble veleando J24 boat in Acapulco.

For corporate contributions, we offer place your logo on our hull and sails for use in regattas in Acapulco and the Mexican National Tour 2015/2016.

You can also help us spread the word about our campaign, sharing the link!

The more people know about our objective is more likely that the campaign to reach its goal.

Tell your friends and family on Facebook and Twitter and follow us on

Facebook: https://m.facebook.com/GahuRC

Facebook Hugo: https://m.facebook.com/hugo.mirandareyes

Facebook Gabriel: https://m.facebook.com/gabo.gabriel.98

You can also contact us: 52-744-117-3358 y 52-744-174-8257

Each contribution ACCOUNT, NO MATTER THE AMOUNT, AND WE ARE VERY GRATEFUL

Thanks for taking the time to read our campaign and support the way you can!

                                                            THANK YOU!

story:
Short Summary

Have you ever dreamed of spending your holidays or shorter journeys away from average budget tourists and their mainstream travel destinations?  Sleeping in castles or palaces, rafting in Grand Canyon, walking on the Great Wall in China without encountering a single person, flying a balloon or zeppelin, or following traces of the Roman Empire?


How about taking a panoramic helicopter or airplane tours above cities or breathtaking landscape, touching bones of dinosaurs directly on the ground, being alone in the Vatican's Sistine Chapel, listening to a local guide about facts that cannot be found in any book?


Or, are you simply not happy with your "diluted" travel experience from the past which resulted from your lack of proper preparation for your journeys?

If so, I would be happy to help you realize your dreams with my travel destination recommendation website www.wkinspirations.travel which I have been getting ready for since 1980. I am a very experienced businessman, ex-Nike Poland GM who decided to quit corporate life after 20 years of successful "service" and to build something important for myself, my family, friends and the travel community.


This project comes from my passion for cultural and heritage travelling combined with nature sightseeing. If you are or want to be an independent traveller who loves history, art, architecture, geography and nature, I would like to help you in choosing regions to visit which match your traveler's profile precisely. For my recommended regions, you will be able to buy a list of your preferred attractions, top class guide-books, purchase trip plans fully customized for your needs and receive recommendations of the proven, local tourist service providers.


You can see all photos from the sections above by going to my website here and reviewing each category one by one.

What We Need & What You Get

With my services you will:

  1. Save a lot of time on trip preparation,
  2. Broaden your travel destination option by finding new, non-mainstream places to visit that you are unaware of,
  3. Understand the visited and local people better.

My dream is to make www.wkinspirations.travel one of the world's best websites of its kind. I am starting this campaign under "Small Business" category. Please help me go global with my venture and surprise the "big sharks" of the tourist market!

  

The Impact

With my recommendations, newsletter and blog, WK Travel Inspirations will inspire and educate you, make your trip preparation easier, faster and more enjoyable. I focus on recommending regions with the highest concentration of your preferred, best quality attractions, including the UNESCO World Heritage sites in Europe, North America and part of China. I also provide information about logistics, the best beaches, places for watersports and attractions for kids in every region that I recommend.

With your help I want this project to grow globally, to create new jobs starting from June 2016, to build network of content developers, proven service providers in different parts of the world. I will involve my family and friends with this project.

I promise not to waste a cent of your contributions. I am not a rookie in developing new businesses. As a GM of Telepizza Poland, a Spanish pizza delivery chain, I started first professional motorbike pizza delivery in Poland and introduced the first mozzarella production line in Poland. As a GM of Nike Poland, I developed its business from 0 to 150 million USD (wholesale) within 13 years and made Nike strong no. 1 sports brand in Poland. Together with my team, we received over 20 Nike and industrial awards for outstanding performance. For 4 years I ran one person consulting company WK Profit Consulting who has 35 clients and operates in 11 segments. My client base includes such international companies: UBS, G-Star, CAP Gemini, distributors of New Balance, Nike, Adidas, Rbk, Converse, O'Neil, Timberland, Umbro, New Era, Jordan, North Face, etc. I am a mentor in the European Commission projects. I was accepted for the affiliate programs by Amazon and Sport Events 365 (National Geographic is on the way). 

www.wkinspirations.travel is not an idea to develop with uncertain outcome. The project is 95 % completed but requires final tuning and promotion. 
I have spent 35 years visiting recommended places personally, collecting photos, films, guidebooks, information leaflets, checking local services, etc. I have been working on this project for the last 3 years, including 10 hours a day for the last 6 months. My travel database has 30.000 entries. I cover 3 continents, 25 countries, 100 regions and 3000 carefully selected attractions. With your contribution I will be able to:

Short-term needs:
  1. Get the word out outside my home country - Poland
  2. Partly automate Trip Plan algorithm (Region Recommendations and Lists of Your Attractions in Regions are already automated) - 2000 EUR
  3. Optimize the website design and its Polish version - 1100 EUR
  4. Correct errors on the website - 600 EUR
  5. Include your feedback from using the website
  6. Invest in SEO - 2300 EUR
  7. Employ full time social media person - 4000 EUR
  8. Create a network of permanent collaborators (existing and new, friends, family, etc.) and help them combine fun with exciting job - 5000 EUR

Long-term needs:

  1. Add more continents, countries, regions, attractions to cover all geographies with my services
  2. Continuously develop inspiring content
  3. Make my application mobile.

The picture below shows what a one of Region Recommendation main sections looks like. Once you complete your search for your preferred Region to visit, in your Region Recommendation, you will get this table which will show your interests matched with a number of attractions sorted by their quality:


The following picture demonstrates just one example of attractions' descriptions by level of your interest (List of Your Attractions in a Region). The complete report for Warsaw & surroundings has 7 pages!

The following two images show Day 1 and 3 of an exemplary Trip Plan to Warsaw:

In the next picture you can see the three types of trips that I usually organise:

I am not asking you to cover all of my short term financial needs related to this project but just for 15.000 EUR "to make the ball rolling down the hill". I have already invested my own money and I plan to continue doing so in the future. However, if you, folks exceed required 15.000 EUR contribution, so I can start to work with more people, expand my geographic coverage faster, I will be delighted!!!

The registration to my website is available. You can get your purchased perks within 2-7 days. With Indiegogo and your early bird contribution, you can buy your perks 20% cheaper than with my regular pricelist, NOW. I also understand that this summer holidays are coming quickly and you may need urgent help.

Even for perks related to Trip Plan preparation, I will do my best to prepare them much faster than within 2 months, starting from June on “the first come, first served” basis.

Please note that whatever perk you will choose, you do not have to use it immediately or during the 2016 summer season. The attractions that I recommend will not go away and you can benefit from my recommendations, lists and trip plans for the coming years. It may be also a perfect gift to your relatives or friends.

All contributors who will buy my perks and folks who will sign up to my newsletter will receive 30 newsletters with inspiring stories during the next 2 months.  You can read one example of blog post about Herculaneum in Italy on the website. 


Risks & challenges

I am 52 years old but my mind is much younger. I have put all my general management, consulting and mentoring experience in this project. I am still willing to learn new things and listen to smarter than me. When you work for so many years for companies like Nike and are surrounded by inspiring people, you tend to see more opportunities than risks and challenges.

This project will not fail! It can grow slower than I expect but it is fine with me. I will be patient and focus on delivering new and exciting content to you. At this point, I can name the following risks:

  1. I am “hit by a symbolic bus” but it applies to any project and its creators.
  2. Due to the lower than expected number of clients in the customer base, the project will take-off slowly and will remain another local, niche travel website.
  3. Some of potential clients will not be willing to fill out my detailed questionnaire to set up their traveler’s profile.
  4. After logging in, my application is not mobile for Iphones or Android systems. However, my main page, its submenus and blog are mobile.

To overcome the above obstacles, I will:

  1. Drive carefully, when crossing the streets: look left, right, left (except the UK, Irelend, Malta  where I will start from looking right first),
  2. Focus on delivering top class content, building high quality client database through social media, SEO, newsletter, blog and personal contacts, etc.,
  3. Take every step necessary to keep your personal data secret: online customer security (SSL) from GeoTrust, PayPal for payments, build alternative way to express clients’ needs, convince my clients that my website is like “slow food” or looking for a life partner (you cannot do everything in few clicks).
  4. Make a mobile version of my website

Other Ways You Can Help

If, for any reason you cannot contribute financially to my project now, please:

  1. Visit www.wkinspirations.travel and sign up to my newsletter for free – let me inspire you and give you more reasons to join my client base!
  2. Get the word out to people who are interested in independent traveling, history, art, geography architecture and nature (at least 1-2 of the these interests)
  3. You can also support me by following WK Travel Inspirations on different social media channels and sharing the links with your friends and family:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wkinspirations/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wkinspirations.travel/
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/wkinspirations

IF YOU HAVE ANY DOUBTS ABOUT WHICH PERK TO CHOOSE OR YOU WOULD LIKE TO MODIFY IT TO MATCH YOUR SPECIFIC TRAVEL NEEDS, PLEASE CONTACT ME AT witold.kowalski@wktravel.eu.

My client base includes such international companies: UBS, G-Star, CAP Gemini, distributors of New Balance, Nike, Adidas, Rbk, Converse, O'Neil, Timberland, Umbro, New Era, Jordan, North Face, etc. I am a mentor in the European Commission projects. I was accepted for the affiliate programs by Amazon and Sport Events 365 (National Geographic is on the way). 



www.wkinspirations.travel is not an idea to develop with uncertain outcome. The project is 95 % completed but requires final tuning and promotion. 
I have spent 35 years visiting recommended places personally, collecting photos, films, guidebooks, information leaflets, checking local services, etc. I have been working on this project for the last 3 years, including 10 hours a day for the last 6 months. My travel database has 30.000 entries. I cover 3 continents, 25 countries, 100 regions and 3000 carefully selected attractions. With your contribution I will be able to:Short-term needs:
Get the word out outside my home country - Poland
Partly automate Trip Plan algorithm (Region Recommendations and Lists of Your Attractions in Regions are already automated) - 2000 EUR
Optimize the website design and its Polish version - 1100 EUR
Correct errors on the website - 600 EUR
Include your feedback from using the website
Invest in SEO - 2300 EUR
Employ full time social media person - 4000 EUR
Create a network of permanent collaborators (existing and new, friends, family, etc.) and help them combine fun with exciting job - 5000 EUR
Long-term needs:
Add more continents, countries, regions, attractions to cover all geographies with my services
Continuously develop inspiring content 
Make my application mobile.
The picture below shows what a one of Region Recommendation main sections looks like. Once you complete your search for your preferred Region to visit, in your Region Recommendation, you will get this table which will show your interests matched with a number of attractions sorted by their quality:The following picture demonstrates just one example of attractions' descriptions by level of your interest (List of Your Attractions in a Region). The complete report for Warsaw & surroundings has 7 pages!The following two images show Day 1 and 3 of an exemplary Trip Plan to Warsaw:In the next picture you can see the three types of trips that I usually organise:I am not asking you to cover all of my short term financial needs related to this project but just for 15.000 EUR "to make the ball rolling down the hill". I have already invested my own money and I plan to continue doing so in the future. However, if you, folks exceed required 15.000 EUR contribution, so I can start to work with more people, expand my geographic coverage faster, I will be delighted!!!
The registration to my website is available. You can get your purchased perks within 2-7 days. With Indiegogo and your early bird contribution, you can buy your perks 20% cheaper than with my regular pricelist, NOW. I also understand that this summer holidays are coming quickly and you may need urgent help.
Even for perks related to Trip Plan preparation, I will do my best to prepare them much faster than within 2 months, starting from June on “the first come, first served” basis. 
Please note that whatever perk you will choose, you do not have to use it immediately or during the 2016 summer season. The attractions that I recommend will not go away and you can benefit from my recommendations, lists and trip plans for the coming years. It may be also a perfect gift to your relatives or friends.
All contributors who will buy my perks and folks who will sign up to my newsletter will receive 30 newsletters with inspiring stories during the next 2 months.  You can read one example of blog post about Herculaneum in Italy on the website. 
Risks & challenges
 I am 52 years old but my mind is much younger. I have put all my general management, consulting and mentoring experience in this project. I am still willing to learn new things and listen to smarter than me. When you work for so many years for companies like Nike and are surrounded by inspiring people, you tend to see more opportunities than risks and challenges. 
This project will not fail!  It can grow slower than I expect but it is fine with me. I will be patient and focus on delivering new and exciting content to you.  At this point, I can name the following risks:

I am “hit by a symbolic bus” but it applies to any project and its creators.
Due to the lower than expected number of clients in the customer base, the project will take-off slowly and will remain another local, niche travel website.
Some of potential clients will not be willing to fill out my detailed questionnaire to set up their traveler’s profile.
After logging in, my application is not mobile for Iphones or Android systems. However, my main page, its submenus and blog are mobile.
To overcome the above obstacles, I will:
Drive carefully, when crossing the streets: look left, right, left (except the UK, Irelend, Malta  where I will start from looking right first),
Focus on delivering top class content, building high quality client database through social media, SEO, newsletter, blog and personal contacts, etc.,
Take every step necessary to keep your personal data secret: online customer security (SSL) from GeoTrust, PayPal for payments, build alternative way to express clients’ needs, convince my clients that my website is like “slow food” or looking for a life partner (you cannot do everything in few clicks).

Make a mobile version of my website

Other Ways You Can Help
If, for any reason you cannot contribute financially to my project now, please:
Visit www.wkinspirations.travel and sign up to my newsletter for free – let me inspire you and give you more reasons to join my client base!

Get the word out to people who are interested in independent traveling, history, art, geography architecture and nature (at least 1-2 of the these interests)
You can also support me by following WK Travel Inspirations on different social media channels and sharing the links with your friends and family:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wkinspirations/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wkinspirations.travel/Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/wkinspirations


IF YOU HAVE ANY DOUBTS ABOUT WHICH PERK TO CHOOSE OR YOU WOULD LIKE TO MODIFY IT TO MATCH YOUR SPECIFIC TRAVEL NEEDS, PLEASE CONTACT ME AT witold.kowalski@wktravel.eu.

story:
Friday, July 22nd - OK, ALL!! We're going HAM for the last 7 days of our campaign to complete our $25k raise for our new shop, FrankieLucy Bakeshop, opening in late 2016 in Silverlake!! We wanted to give everyone a little break from our campaigning, but there is no holding back now. Muahahah. ;-)

We've raised $2365 thanks to ALL OUR AWESOME BACKERS. That means a little more than $22k in 7 days. Can we do it? By the grace of God and the powers of Grayskull, I SAY, HELL YES!!

This weekend, we are running a special perk for EVERY DOLLAR contributed to our campaign from today through Sunday, July 24th 11:59pm, we will match DOLLAR FOR DOLLAR with CCLA Bucks! So, if you contribute $50, receive 50 CCLA Bucks for use at Crème Caramel LA, Sherman Oaks! CCLA Bucks will be sent out in September 2016 and NEVER EXPIRE. EVER.
Just select BACK IT on our page and every person contributing without selecting one of our original perks, will automatically receive this special promotion. You help us, we feed you. LET'S GET TO $25K!!!!

Who are FOUND COFFEE + CRÈME CARAMEL LA?

Annie Choi, lady boss at Found Coffee, and Kristine de la Cruz and Sean Gilleland, custard overlords at Crème Caramel LA, are collaborating on a second location in Silverlake!

We're bringing our love of coffee and custard together into a powerhouse of awesome treats and fantastic customer service. (Check out our YELP!)

Crème Caramel LA got its start in farmers' markets in East Hollywood from Silverlake FM to Atwater Village FM to Echo Park FM to Barnsdall FM and 11 other farmers' market locations in Los Angeles. Since opening the Sherman Oaks brick and mortar in 2013, (the only Valley mention on Eater LA's pastry map!), they've missed their customers on the Eastside and have been looking forward to bringing their Filipino "Leche Flan" custard back in a slew of delicious treats: crème caramel, custard pies, bread pudding, budinos and more! 

But that's not all, since opening their shop, they've expanded into savories: quiches, Spanish Tortilla, strata, sandwiches, and salads.

And we can't forget our housemade Ube Horchata! Vegan, purple, and delicious!

Found Coffee celebrated their 1st anniversary at their Eagle Rock location and have quickly become a neighborhood and L.A. favorite! Coffee + training from Demitasse, plus amazing customer service has earned kudos on Eater LA, Thrillist, and LAist listicles.

And we're bringing all this fantastic goodness to  our new FRANKIELUCY: BAKESHOP!

Ok, it's a shell, but what a pretty one!

We're aiming for a Fall 2016 opening and in order to do that, we would love/need your help and contribution. Every egg cracked, Ube Upside Down Pie sold, Latte steamed, has led us to this moment where we can bring our passion for all things custards and confections back to where we started in Silverlake. We've set up our capital budget and are seeking contributors to help fund our equipment purchases. Our overall budget for equipment is $49.6k (Refrigerated display case, La Marzocco espresso machine, grinders, refrigerators, freezer, cold brew tap, convection oven, and shaved ice machine are the heavy hitters.) but we're aiming to raise $25k with your generous support here on Indiegogo to give us a headstart! Staying with us so far? Excellent, here's where we need your help.


What We Need & What You Get

By contributing to this campaign to raise $25,000 on Indiegogo to help us fund our equipment budget, you not only bring essential equipment into our space, you also draw our delicious coffee and delectable custards closer to you! Crème Caramel LA started out in farmers' markets in Silverlake, Echo Park, Atwater Village, and more on the Eastside and while we opened in the Valley servicing a wonderful neighborhood, we knew we would eventually come back to be closer to our first customers and home! (EASTSIDERS!)

HELP US UNLOCK THE ITEMS ON OUR
FRANKIELUCY BAKESHOP EQUIPMENT LIST:
Water Tower $975.00
EK Grinder $1,900.00
Simonelli Grinder $1,856.00
Mazzer Grinder $850.00
Espresso Machine $9,000.00
Undercounter Fridge (2) $2,100.00
Ice Machine $2,168.00
Dipperwell $89.00
Fetco Batch Brew $2,050.00
Double Door Storage Fridge $2,138.00 x 2
Chrome Shelves (4 sets) $70.00
Reverse Osmosis H20 System $3,000.00
Display Fridge $8900.00
Mop Sink $200 - UNLOCKED 7/5 (Thank you, Ed N. and Jessie P!!)
Chest Freezer $300
3 Compartment Sink $700
Bathroom Sink - $400 - UNLOCKED 6/30 (Thank you Julian Y, Yoshizawas, Jed, Leyna, Tu, and Keisa!!)
Toilet - $200 - UNLOCKED! 7/3 (Thank you Jeff D., Ninofranco family, Genesis R., and Andrew C. and Ashley!!)
Convection Oven - $1000 - UNLOCKED 7/5! (Thank you, Ashley, Justin F, MY AWESOME MOM - Nollie, and Liz R!!)
Panini Press - $300 - UNLOCKED 7/6 (Thank you, James & Gen Y, Angela P., and Tinio Pups!!)
Smallwares - $1000
Cold Brew Specialty Machine $7000
Pitcher Washer - $300

...and with your help, we can make it happen!

The Perks:

First, thank you for reading this far. Second, if you're considering contributing to our project, THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU! We put together the following perks on the right combined with our deepest gratitude for any contribution you make to help us open the Silverlake location.

The Impact

This is our first buildout (Crème Caramel LA) and we are so excited about bringing our desserts closer to our Eastside (and super Eastside, I'm talking to you, Chino Hills, Diamond Bar, Pomona) family. We anticipate that with this move, we will be expanding out even closer to you in the next 3 years!

Risks & Challenges

A note from Kristine:
Leaving my job at West Coast Music was hard, especially the security of a full-time job and the ability to take time off when I needed it. Taking the leap of going into my own business was scary, but I knew that if I didn't try to make a go of it, I would have regretted each day I did not start. So, in July 2009, I leapt and here I am today. We employ the best front of house and baking staff who are as lovely and awesome as you can imagine and if you've ever come into our Sherman Oaks shop, I am sure you will agree. Our little shop has been blessed with regulars that make our shop their morning/weekend tradition. We've seen the actual growth of some of those regulars (babies, relationships, and families)! (Oh, and a little thing like 40% year upon year growth in the last 3 years is something we did too.)

I can't promise definitively that FrankieLucy Bakeshop will be the dessert destination in Silverlake, but hell, I can tell you I will put in every ounce of blood, sweat, and tears, to make it happen. I hope you will take the leap with us too!

Other Ways You Can Help

Indiegogo gives us a platform to raise the money, but your contribution does not have to be monetary. Potentially more valuable is your help in spreading the word about our campaign. Even if you are unable to contribute at this time, we hope you'll take a few minutes to get the word out and post our story on your page!! 

Indiegogo makes it SUPER easy by using the share tools at the top of our page. Click on any (and hopefully all) and spread the word!

If you do share the campaign, be sure to tag us on Facebook - Crème Caramel LA, Twitter - @CremeCaramelLA, or Instagram @creme_caramel_LA to receive a $5.00 discount coupon redeemable at the Sherman Oaks Crème Caramel LA location. (One coupon per customer, coupon codes will be sent out in August 2016.)

Thank you again for reading and hopefully contributing. We would love to see you soon!
